name: R5-TerminologyCapabilities-R4-TerminologyCapabilities
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 TerminologyCapabilities into FHIR R4

target.comment: R5 `TerminologyCapabilities` maps as Equivalent to R4 `TerminologyCapabilities`
R5 `TerminologyCapabilities.closure` maps as Equivalent to R4 `TerminologyCapabilities.closure`

R5 `TerminologyCapabilities.closure.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `TerminologyCapabilities.closure.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `TerminologyCapabilities.closure.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `TerminologyCapabilities.closure.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `TerminologyCapabilities.closure.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `TerminologyCapabilities.closure.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`
R5 `TerminologyCapabilities.closure.translation` maps as Equivalent to R4 `TerminologyCapabilities.closure.translation`

R5 `TerminologyCapabilities.codeSearch` maps as Equivalent to R4 `TerminologyCapabilities.codeSearch` - codeSearch has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/code-search-support|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/code-search-support|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

R5 `TerminologyCapabilities.codeSystem.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `TerminologyCapabilities.codeSystem.id`

target.comment: R5 `TerminologyCapabilities.codeSystem.version.isDefault` maps as Equivalent to R4 `TerminologyCapabilities.codeSystem.version.isDefault`

R5 `TerminologyCapabilities.codeSystem.version.language` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4 `TerminologyCapabilities.codeSystem.version.language` - language removed a binding requirement - Required http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/languages|5.0.0; language has change due to type change: R5 `language` `code` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R4 `language`

R5 `TerminologyCapabilities.kind` maps as Equivalent to R4 `TerminologyCapabilities.kind` - kind has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/capability-statement-kind|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/capability-statement-kind|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

R5 `TerminologyCapabilities.language` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4 `TerminologyCapabilities.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred; language has change due to type change: R5 `language` `code` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R4 `language`
